Company Milestone

Two Thousand Thirteen - 2014

Established the company, Get 1st Project of Interior Parts for Yaris/Vios

Two Thousand Fifteen - 2015

Support model :
Innova/Fortuner Calya/Sigra

Two Thousand Seventeen - 2017

EATI became KOJIMA Group. Support model :
Yaris/Vios,Sienta, Rush/Terios

Two Thousand Twenty-One - 2021

Support model :
Rocky/Raize/Xenia/Avanza/Veloz

Two Thousand Twenty-Two - 2022

Support Model :
Zennix

Two Thousand Twenty-Three - 2023

Expand to Electrical Parts by establishing Clean Room

Two Thousand Twenty-Four - 2024

Optimize VAVE, Localization Project, Get ready for future TDNGA#2
